subtitle:
1
00:00:45,500 --> 00:00:52,500
Tâi-oân sī seⁿ lán ê só͘-chāi
Taiwan is the place that gave birth to us

2
00:00:53,500 --> 00:01:01,000
kám-liām kám-un chāi gún sim-lāi
Gratitude and thanksgiving are in our hearts

3
00:01:02,000 --> 00:01:10,000
Hù-chhut chêng-ì, hù-chhut ài
Giving our affection, giving our love

4
00:01:10,500 --> 00:01:19,000
tāi-tāi hoe-lúi tāi-tāi chai
Generations of flowers are planted by generations

5
00:01:20,000 --> 00:01:28,000
Tâi-oân ê sì-piⁿ lóng sī hái
Taiwan is surrounded by the sea on all sides

6
00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:36,500
chheng-san le̍k-chúi sûi gún lâi
Green mountains and clear waters follow us

7
00:01:37,000 --> 00:01:44,500
Bí-lē san-hô lán só͘ ài
The beautiful mountains and rivers are what we love

8
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:54,000
m̄-thang hō͘ lâng lâi phò-hāi
Let us not allow anyone to destroy them

9
00:01:55,500 --> 00:02:03,000
Tâi-oân tu̍t-chhut Tiong-iong Soaⁿ-me̍h
Taiwan stands out with the Central Mountain Range

10
00:02:04,000 --> 00:02:11,500
hong-hong sio-liâm chhah-ji̍p hûn lāi
Peaks connected to peaks, piercing into the clouds

11
00:02:12,000 --> 00:02:19,500
Gio̍k-san, A-lí kàu Kî-lâi
From Jade Mountain, Alishan to Qilai Mountain

12
00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:29,000
che sī miā-kin ê só͘-chāi
This is where our life-roots lie

13
00:02:30,500 --> 00:02:34,500
Tâi-oân sī seⁿ lán ê só͘-chāi
(Spoken) Taiwan is the place that gave birth to us

14
00:02:35,000 --> 00:02:37,500
kám-liām kám-un chāi gún sim-lāi
(Spoken) Gratitude and thanksgiving are in our hearts
